posts.post_content:
Hello,
I know there have been quite a few T3s available on the board recently, but here are a few different ones.  Just in time for the 100 year anniversary of T3 (technically they began production in 1910).  I am happy to send front and back scans of any of the cards - just showing the Joss here in order to conserve space.  Here's what I have:

Joss - PSA-A - see scan, a tiny clip of the bottom right corner probably keeps it from being graded a PSA-4.  Very clean card front & back - $400

Griffith - PSA-3 - great color & focus, clean back - SOLD

Collins - PSA-3(MK) - Super clear focus and color - erased mark on the Turkey Red ad-back gives it the MK - SOLD

Wallace - PSA-4 - great card, hard to find, clean ad-back, books for $825 - asking $750 - grab it.

Crawford - raw - pinhole in each corner, otherwise very clean front and back - SOLD

Meyers at Bat - SGC-40 - very tough card, very clean - $450

Pfeister - PSA-4 - great color, clean - $425

McBride - PSA-3.5 - such a beautiful card from the difficult second series - $400

Ames - PSA-4 - niceer than most out there, clean ad-back - $375

McIntyre (Brooklyn & Chic) - PSA-5(MK) - a few tiny pencil marks on the back? not quite sure about the MK, otherwise clean & bright f&b - $400

Rhoades - raw - 2 tiny p/h, corner crease, light back stamp, great corners, awesome color and focus on this difficult card - $500

Let's make a deal!

Hapy collecting,
Craig

E-mail sent.  Always great to see your T3 posts.
Mike
